name: Bouncy Square
description:
Being new to both Godot AND game jams in general, I decided to recreate an existing game idea. It would have to be simple enough for me not to worry too much about game logic and instead allow me to focus on learning Godot functionality and GDScript syntax.

After a bit of brainstorming, I've decided to make a Super Gravitron clone.

Controls

Press SPACE to start the game. Use left and right arrow keys to slide.

(X360 controllers should also work)

What's the point?

Avoid the incoming obstacles. You can wrap around the screen.

Credits

  • Font: Permanent Marker by Font Diner. License: https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

  • Engine: Godot, duh! License: https://godotengine.org/license
